name: FPS Character Animation
description:
This prototype is part of my Bachelor's Degree in Game Design. I'm focusing character animation and ways to convey personality of a character using animation from the first person perspective. 

For the project I did the character design, modeling, rigging, animation and animation implementation, as well as the testing range. I also did most of the VFX. As a project based I used the FPS Creator Kit by Unity.
